title: Hear'em Rave (1918) Directed By Gilbert Pratt

sources.title: Hear'em Rave (1918) Directed By Gilbert Pratt
sources.description: Hear 'Em Rave Directed by Gilbert Pratt Produced by Hal Roach Starring Harold Lloyd Release date December 1, 1918 Country United States Languages Silent English intertitles Hear 'Em Rave is a 1918 American short comedy film featuring Harold Lloyd . The runtime of the short film is 11 minutes, and it was released on December 1, 1918 in the United States. [ 1 ] Cast Harold Lloyd Snub Pollard Bebe Daniels William Blaisdell William Gillespie Lew Harvey Bud Jamison Oscar Larson James Parrott Dorothea Wolbert Noah Young References "Hear 'Em Rave" . Silent Era . Retrieved May 6, 2020 .
